name: github-mapper-mcp-server
description: An MCP server that maps and analyzes GitHub repository structures, providing summary statistics and detailed file structures.

tools.name: set-github-token
tools.description: Set the GitHub Personal Access Token for authentication

tools.name: map-github-repo
tools.description: Map a GitHub repository structure and provide summary information

repoUrl.description: URL of the GitHub repository (e.g., https://github.com/username/repo)
